scripts.install-latest-dev-deps: npm i -D @types/jest@latest husky@latest jest@latest lint-staged@latest rimraf@latest ts-jest@latest tslint@latest tslint-config-prettier@latest typescript@latest
scripts.prep: npm run install-latest-dev-deps && npm run install-exact-prettier && npm run reset-git && echo '# My new project' > Readme.md
scripts.postinstall: npm run prep && git init && node ./node_modules/husky/lib/installer/bin.js install && node ./remove-unnecessary-scripts.js && rimraf remove-unnecessary-scripts.js && npm init
